StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Center for Craniofacial and Dental Genetics: Study of Dental Caries and Cleft Lip/Palate in Guatemala

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: “Center for Craniofacial and Dental Genetics: Study of Dental Caries and Cleft Lip/Palate in Guatemala” is part of the Gene Environment Association Studies (GENEVA, http://www.genevastudy.org) program of the trans-NIH Genes, Environment and Health Initiative (GEI). Funding support for the study was provided by the National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research (NIDCR, grant number U01 DE018903). Data and samples were provided through funding from NIDCR (R01 DE016148). Genotyping was performed at the GENEVA genotyping center at the Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard (U01 HG004424). Assistance with phenotype harmonization and genotype cleaning, as well as with general study coordination, was provided by the GENEVA Coordinating Center (U01 HG004446) and by the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI). The datasets used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sites/entrez?Db=gap through dbGaP accession number phs000440.v1.p1.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Limited to genetic studies relevant to oral health.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Oral Health
ConsentGroup.name: OH
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Limited to genetic studies relevant to oral health.
